title: Ep99: Royal Norfolk Regiment in India
itunes:title: Ep99: Royal Norfolk Regiment in India
itunes:subtitle: Peter and Gary continue their story of the Royal Norfolk Regiment in WW2 as the unit redeploys to India. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or subscribe to our...
description:
Peter and Gary continue their story of the Royal Norfolk Regiment in WW2 as the unit redeploys to India.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.
